subject: Order number 098224P248757 Tracking
description_text:
Hello,

 I purchased some pedals and a haptic mount from you on Dec 13th. I only received tracking for the mount, not the pedals. I'm not in a hurry, I just wanted to ask if you could help me with an approximate delivery time. I'm excited about these pedals. 

Have a nice day.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10014 中
